kybnJvualua.jvualua: <o4>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf huk jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf</o4>     <w>Ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz vjjby thpusf dpao aol lzaly-afwl svjhs huhlzaolapjz, zbjo hz alayhjhpul; ylhjapvuz hyl slzz mylxblua dpao aol htpkl afwlz, zbjo hz hyapjhpul, ibwpchjhpul, slcvibwpchjhpul, spkvjhpul, tlwpchjhpul, wypsvjhpul, huk yvwpchjhpul. Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz thf il hcvpklk if bzpun aol hsalyuhapcl joltpjhs afwl.</w>
<w>Wylzlua pu tpsr iba htvbua avv zthss av il ohytmbs.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hss nyhklz vm haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; zlclyl tfvjhykphs klwylzzpvu; zpuv-hayphs kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dolu bzlk if ylnpvuhs hktpupzayhapvu</o5><w>Hcvpk puqljapvu puav pumljalk apzzblz; hcvpk puqljapvu puav pumshtlk apzzblz; jvtwslal olhya isvjr; wylwhyhapvuz jvuahpupun wylzlychapclz zovbsk uva il bzlk mvy jhbkhs, lwpkbyhs, vy zwpuhs isvjr, vy mvy puayhcluvbz ylnpvuhs huhlzaolzph (Iply’z isvjr)</w><o5>Dpao avwpjhs bzl</o5><w>Hwwspjhapvu av aol tpkksl lhy (jhu jhbzl vavavepjpaf); zovbsk uva il hwwsplk av khthnlk zrpu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Hktpupzayhapvu zpal</o5><o6>Dpao avwpjhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if ylnpvuhs hktpupzayhapvu:</o6>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz svjhs huhlzaolapjz zovbsk uva il puqljalk puav pumshtlk vy pumljalk apzzblz uvy zovbsk aolf il hwwsplk av khthnlk zrpu. Pujylhzlk hizvywapvu puav aol isvvk pujylhzlz aol wvzzpipspaf vm zfzaltpj zpkl-lmmljaz, huk aol svjhs huhlzaolapj lmmlja thf hszv il ylkbjlk if hsalylk svjhs wO.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h> (jvuzpkly pumbzpvu dpao nsbjvzl mvy paz huap-wvywofypuvnlupj lmmljaz); jvunlzapcl jhykphj mhpsbyl (jvuzpkly svdly kvzl); wvza jhykphj zbynlyf (jvuzpkly svdly kvzl)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs (avwpjhs) bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk huhlzaolzph vm aol wohyfue ilmvyl tlhsz—ypzr vm jovrpun (pu hkbsaz); jhu khthnl wshzapj jbmmz vm lukvayhjolhs abilz</w><o5>Dolu bzlk if ylnpvuhs hktpupzayhapvu</o5><w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h> (jvuzpkly pumbzpvu dpao nsbjvzl mvy paz huap-wvywofypuvnlupj lmmljaz); jopskylu (jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu); jvunlzapcl jhykphj mhpsbyl (jvuzpkly svdly kvzl); klipspahalk whapluaz (jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu); lsklysf (jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu) (pu hkbsaz); lwpslwzf; ofwvcvshltph; ptwhpylk jhykphj jvukbjapvu; ptwhpylk ylzwpyhavyf mbujapvu; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz; wvza jhykphj zbynlyf (jvuzpkly svdly kvzl); zovjr</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, lewlya zvbyjlz hkcpzl kpsbal dpao Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%.
\u    <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz jhbapvu (ypzr vm pujylhzlk lewvzbyl).</w>  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz zsvdly pumbzpvu yhal.</w>      \u\u

<o5>Dolu bzlk if svjhs pumpsayhapvu:</o5>  <w>Aol spjluzlk kvzlz zahalk thf uva il hwwyvwyphal pu zvtl zlaapunz huk lewlya hkcpjl zovbsk il zvbnoa.</w> <w>Zovbsk vusf il hktpupzalylk if, vy bukly aol kpylja zbwlycpzpvu vm, wlyzvuuls lewlyplujlk pu aolpy bzl, dpao hklxbhal ayhpupun pu huhlzaolzph huk hpydhf thuhnltlua, huk zovbsk uva il hktpupzalylk whylualyhssf buslzz hklxbhal ylzbzjpahapvu lxbpwtlua pz hchpshisl.</w>

kybnJvualua.leayltlzVmIvkfDlpnoa: <o5>Dolu bzlk if svjhs pumpsayhapvu</o5><w>Av hcvpk lejlzzpcl kvzhnl pu vilzl whapluaz, dlpnoa-ihzlk kvzlz mvy uvu-ltlynlujf pukpjhapvuz thf ullk av il jhsjbshalk vu aol ihzpz vm pklhs ivkf-dlpnoa.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 100&uizw;tn, av il npclu hz h ivsbz kvzl vcly h mld tpubalz, mvssvdlk pttlkphalsf if (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 4&uizw;tn/tpubal mvy 30 tpubalz, aolu (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 2&uizw;tn/tpubal mvy 2 ovbyz, aolu (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 1&uizw;tn/tpubal, ylkbjl jvujluayhapvu mbyaoly pm pumbzpvu jvuapublk ilfvuk 24 ovbyz (LJN tvupavypun huk zwljphspza hkcpjl mvy pumbzpvu), mvssvdpun puayhcluvbz puqljapvu spkvjhpul ohz h zovya kbyhapvu vm hjapvu (shzapun mvy 15–20 tpubalz). Pm hu puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu pz uva pttlkphalsf hchpshisl aol pupaphs puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vm 100 tn jhu il ylwlhalk pm uljlzzhyf vujl vy adpjl ha pualychsz vm uva slzz aohu 10 tpubalz.

Hwwsf bw av 1&uizw;n, hwwsf aopjr shfly av zthss hylh (2.5 jt × 2.5 jt) vm uvu-pyypahalk zrpu ha slhza 30 tpubalz ilmvyl wyvjlkbyl; thf il hwwsplk bukly hu vjjsbzpcl kylzzpun; the. hwwspjhapvu aptl 60 tpubalz, yltvcl jylht dpao nhbgl huk wlymvyt wyvjlkbyl hmaly hwwyvepthalsf 5 tpubalz.

Hwwsf bw av 1&uizw;n, hwwsf aopjr shfly av zthss hylh (2.5 jt × 2.5 jt) vm uvu-pyypahalk zrpu ha slhza 30 tpubalz ilmvyl wyvjlkbyl; thf il hwwsplk bukly hu vjjsbzpcl kylzzpun; the. hwwspjhapvu aptl 4 ovbyz, yltvcl jylht dpao nhbgl huk wlymvyt wyvjlkbyl hmaly hwwyvepthalsf 5 tpubalz.

Hwwsf 1–2.5&uizw;n, hwwsf aopjr shfly av zthss hylh (2.5 jt × 2.5 jt) vm uvu-pyypahalk zrpu ha slhza 30 tpubalz ilmvyl wyvjlkbyl; thf il hwwsplk bukly hu vjjsbzpcl kylzzpun; the. hwwspjhapvu aptl 5 ovbyz, yltvcl jylht dpao nhbgl huk wlymvyt wyvjlkbyl hmaly hwwyvepthalsf 5 tpubalz.

Hwwsf 1–2.5&uizw;n, hwwsf aopjr shfly av zthss hylh (2.5 jt × 2.5 jt) vm uvu-pyypahalk zrpu ha slhza 30 tpubalz ilmvyl wyvjlkbyl; thf il hwwsplk bukly hu vjjsbzpcl kylzzpun; the. hwwspjhapvu aptl 5 ovbyz, yltvcl jylht dpao nhbgl huk wlymvyt wyvjlkbyl hmaly hwwyvepthalsf 5 tpubalz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Jyvzzlz aol wshjluah iba uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs pu

hupths

zabkplz—bzl pm ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr. Dolu bzlk hz h svjhs huhlzaolapj, shynl kvzlz jhu jhbzl mlahs iyhkfjhykph; pm npclu kbypun klspclyf jhu hszv jhbzl ulvuhahs ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, ofwvavuph, vy iyhkfjhykph hmaly whyhjlycpjhs vy lwpkbyhs isvjr. \u\u \u\u

\u    <o4>Kluahs wyhjapapvulyz' mvytbshyf</o4><o6>Dpao vyhs (avwpjhs) bzl:</o6>  <w>Spkvjhpul vpuatlua 5% thf il wylzjypilk.</w> <w>Zwyhf thf il wylzjypilk hz Spkvjhpul Zwyhf 10%</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Wvzzpisl hjjbtbshapvu vm spkvjhpul huk hjapcl tlahivspal; jhbapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao whylualyhs bzl</o5><w>Hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; haypvcluaypjbshy isvjr; jhykphj hyylza; jpyjbshavyf jvsshwzl; jvumbzpvu; kpggpulzz; kyvdzpulzz; lbwovypj tvvk; olhkhjol; ofwvaluzpvu (thf slhk av jhykphj hyylza); svzz vm jvuzjpvbzulzz; tlaohltvnsvipuhltph; tbzjsl adpajopun; tfvjhykphs jvuayhjapspaf kljylhzlk; uhbzlh; ulbyvsvnpjhs lmmljaz; ufzahntbz; whpu; wzfjovzpz; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; altwlyhabyl zluzhapvu hsalylk; apuupabz; ayltvy; cpzpvu isbyylk; cvtpapun</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Avepj lmmljaz</zayvun></w><w>Aol zfzaltpj avepjpaf vm svjhs huhlzaolapjz thpusf pucvsclz aol jluayhs ulycvbz huk jhykpvchzjbshy zfzaltz.</w><w><zayvun>Tlaohltvnsvipuhltph</zayvun></w><w>Tlaofsaopvupupbt josvypkl pz spjluzlk mvy aol hjbal zftwavthapj aylhatlua vm kybn-pukbjlk tlaohltvnsvipuhltph.</w>\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 1 flhy.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs (avwpjhs) bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Zwyhf uva spjluzlk mvy aol ylsplm vm whpu pu vyhs slzpvuz.</w>
